content.description: Start under the low roof left of Gingivitis with a crimp and an undercling Make a hard move to a jug, then go straight up.
content.location: Low roof right of Power, left of Gingivitis

climbs.name: Speak To Me O' Toothless One

content.description: Climb the face opposite Sarah. Start on the left leaning crack at 5ft. and climb straight up.
Stand with a right crimp and a left jug. Pull on and make difficult moves on terrible crimps up the slab/face.
content.location: Stand start to Sarah V11, just left of Power of Silence

content.description: Below the roof, start sitting with a good left hand undercling. Climb out using crimps to finish on Sarah Stand.
content.location: Low roof left of Power of Silence.

content.description:
This Fred Nicole test piece will offer up a challenge for anyone climbing the grade.

 Stack pads or get a lift and start matched on the lowest good crimp. For most people the crux is sticking the decent pocket out right. This move requires tension and accuracy while using a left hand crimp and worse-than-it-looks right foot. A desperate stab into the fingerlock guards the last reach to the lip before topping out.

 Classic and hard, Power of Silence shouldn't be missed on your trip to Hueco Tanks.
content.protection: The landing is perfectly flat. Two pads are probably enough.
content.location: This alcove is just north of Sign of the Cross and straight up the hill (south) from the Diaphanous cave.

content.description: Same start for O Toothless, but move left on a crimp rail and up to another rail, then straight up. There will be a boulder behind you as you go up.
content.location: Left of Speak to Me, O Toothless One

content.description: Crux is at the bottom, technical climbing on small holds.
content.protection: Pads and spotters, this climb has a rock directly behind it. Falling near the top is not recommended.
content.location: The start can be tricky, depending on height, stand on the boulder directly behind the climb to reach the start hold and get your feet on.

content.description: From the triangle jug, climb up and slightly right.
content.location: Furthest route to the right of Power of Silence

content.description:
This route starts on the same slanting crack as Speak to me O Toothless One but traverses left on the crimp rail then up to another rail before the top out.

 I believe this is an FA because of the lack of (there was absolutely zero) chalk, ticks, and any other signs of any climber ever being on this. I chalked up all the holds and did what I think is the FA. Please let me know if this is not an FA.
content.protection: two pads. Make sure one is on the rock to the left.
content.location: Across from Sarah and Power of Silence. Left of Speak to Me O Toothless One.

content.description: In a small corridor, spotters, pads, and confidence in your ability to do these climbs is recommended.
